text:
Chengbao - Hong Kong - http://chengbao.com.hk/

Want to move to Hong Kong? We'll help the right candidate get a visa to relocate here. We make high quality web and native apps related to security. We have an awesome office, a great international team and we are growing fast.

We have the following positions available at our office in Hong Kong: UX Designer/Developer (Web) Senior Android and/or iOS Developer Senior Software Developer (Ruby)

Drop me an email at heidar@chengbao.com.hk or leave a comment if you're interested or have any questions. :)
